entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one leaving out clothes.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has been taking some of Hermione's clothes.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is another house-elf who does not care for clothes and drinks lots.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one whose happiness Dobby is concerned about.
